SwitchPreference.android:title: Hide net-zero transactions
SwitchPreference.android:summary: For each regular transaction, Sia also makes a setup transaction that does not affect your wallet balance. Check this to hide transactions that have zero net effect on your wallet.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Displayed decimal precision
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The number of decimal places displayed. This does not affect actual precision of values in memory, which is exact. When displayed, they will be rounded up.

ListPreference.android:title: Operation mode
ListPreference.android:summary: 1. Interface with your own remote full node\n2. Retrieve data from a server and build transactions locally and upload them to the server. Some features will be unavailable using this.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Remote node address
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The IP address and port number of your remote full node. If your device is not on the same network as it, you will have to port forward.

EditTextPreference.android:title: API password
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The API password set on your remote full node.
